Hero.subtitle: Creative digital marketing agency specializing in web development, mobile apps, digital strategy, and media buying. We bring creativity, relevance, and performance to every project.

AboutUs.title: WHAT WE DO
AboutUs.description1: WaitLa is a Digital Marketing agency specializing in website development, mobile application creation, and digital strategy design.
AboutUs.description2: Our core business is supporting companies and institutions in implementing a digital strategy adapted to new media, in order to create innovative digital solutions.

AboutTeaser.title: We're a creative digital marketing agency
AboutTeaser.description: Specializing in website development, mobile applications, digital strategy, and media buying. We combine creativity, youth, and innovation to help brands reach their full potential.

value.creativityDesc: We think outside the box to deliver innovative solutions that stand out.
value.relevanceDesc: Every strategy is tailored to your audience and business objectives.
value.performanceDesc: Data-driven approaches that deliver measurable results and ROI.

Accreditations.title: Certified Partners & Industry Leaders
Accreditations.description: We're proud to be certified partners with industry-leading platforms, ensuring we deliver cutting-edge solutions.

ClientReferences.title: OUR REFERENCES
ClientReferences.description: We've had the pleasure of partnering with a wide range of brands, from tech startups to renowned companies. Our data-driven approach has contributed to success across various industries. We've enjoyed the journey and look forward to the future.

ContactStrip.title: Ready to Take Your Brand to the Next Level?
ContactStrip.description: Let's discuss how we can help you achieve your digital marketing goals. Get in touch today for a free consultation.

form.success: Thank you! Your information has been submitted successfully. We'll get back to you soon.

PRAndEvents.title: PR and Events
PRAndEvents.subtitle: Make your event a moment that matters
PRAndEvents.description: At Waitla, we design and orchestrate strategic events that strengthen your brand image, create engagement, and generate lasting visibility. We combine public relations, creativity, and content production to transform every event into a true marketing lever.

items.coordination: Coordination with media, influencers, and partners
items.communication: Communication before, during, and after the event

items.optimizedContent: Content optimized for Instagram, TikTok, LinkedIn

ourApproach.title: Our approach
ourApproach.description: At Waitla, an event is never isolated. It's part of a global strategy:

items.hybridTeam: A hybrid team: marketers, developers, and filmmakers
items.lastingContent: Content designed to last after the event

cta.headline: Take action
cta.tagline: More than an event, a brand experience

AgentIAAndCRM.title: AI Agent and integrated CRM
AgentIAAndCRM.subtitle: Automate, personalize and accelerate your growth
AgentIAAndCRM.description: At Waitla, we design and integrate intelligent agents and custom CRM systems to help brands better manage their prospects, automate their processes and improve their commercial performance.
AgentIAAndCRM.tagline: AI is not a gadget. It's a strategic lever.
